# KyrieOS
> Operating System for Agencies - Built with Next.js 16, Supabase, and HeroUI v3.

## Core Files
- [src/app/layout.tsx]: Root layout and styling context.
- [src/app/dashboard/layout.tsx]: Dashboard layout (Server) with Auth checks.
- [src/app/dashboard/sidebar.tsx]: Main navigation component (Complex UI).
- [src/app/dashboard/sidebar-wrapper.tsx]: Client Boundary for Sidebar (Hydration Fix).
- [docs/]: Project documentation.

## Architecture Patterns
- **Hydration Safety**: We use `next/dynamic` with `ssr: false` for complex Client interactive components (Sidebar) to prevent extension conflicts. [Read ADR-001](docs/01-architecture/ADR-001-hydration-strategy.md).
- **Sidebar Logic**: Split into Layout provides Data -> Wrapper provides Client Context -> Logic provides UI. [Read Sidebar Arch](docs/01-architecture/SIDEBAR_ARCHITECTURE.md).
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS v4 + HeroUI v3. Dark/Light mode supported via `next-themes`.

## Key Concepts
- **Workspace-First**: All data is scoped to a Workspace (`workspaces` table).
- **Client-Only Components**: UI elements that float, popup, or use browser APIs must be wrapped or dynamically imported.
- **Authentication**: Supabase Auth (SSR + Client).

## Development
- **Environment**: Google IDX ready (requires $HOME patch for Playwright).
- **Preview**: `npm run dev` (Turbopack enabled).
